nodes.text: Crimson Fang gang was a little known criminal organization operating in Wild Space. Following the death of Empress Vaylin and formation of the Eternal Alliance in 3630 BBY, the Crimson Fang, led by Elarea Aldraste known as "The Red Huntress", took over Port Nowhere by force, planning to use the mobile space station as their base of operations. The Alliance send a strike team on a mission to liberate Port Nowhere, who systematically rid the station of Outer Rim's most notorious villains.
Crimson Fang gang appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during the "Crimson Fang" Uprising.
